Even there aren't exciting first party titles but PS5 isn't just for the first party titles.Nevertheless I finally upgarded it after 10 years of using my OG PS4. Review Title: The Sony PlayStation 5 is a beast!
Review Body: It has been just 4 days now, that I bought this, and all I can say is I am very happy with this product.I have always been a fanboy of Sony since my childhood, starting from the time when I used to watch my father be a fanboy of this company. He was always fascinated by Sony‚Äôs audio products such as the speakers, the Bravia TVs, etc.My first Sony purchase was a PSP and oh boy, I really miss those times getting my hands on that gadget. That portable console was the best to play with and I believe it still is very relevant to this date. And my first phone purchase was the Sony Xperia C and to this date I can say that I was a very proud and satisfied owner of that phone.The Sony PlayStation 5 is a beast. It is amazing to play with. I was very nervous since this was my first major gaming console purchase and I had been waiting for a PlayStation since more than a decade now. All I can say is I am the happiest at this moment and I am glad that I bought this. Now, just waiting for GTA 6 to release! ;)
